main: ^One of your passengers suddenly starts beatboxing.
FirstChoice: ^Your impromptu performance has everyone laughing and clapping along. You're a hit! (PARTY happiness +1)
SecondChoice: ^The rap battle is fierce but friendly. It turns out you're all hidden talents. (PARTY happiness +1.5)
ThirdChoice: ^The beatboxing stops, but so does the fun. Way to kill the vibe. (PARTY happiness -0.5)
